name: Boom Hoppers
description:
Boom Hoppers is a game about shooting grenades and jumping between platforms and buildings.

This game was a student project made over the course of 5 weeks. There's currently no objective, but feel free to create a server or hop into your friend's server and have a bit of fun!

There's currently no way to name your server, or identify who made it, so you won't exactly know if a server in the server list is your friend's or not.

This game is still in beta. We may or may not update it in the future.

------------------------

Controls:

W A S D - Movement

Left click - Shoot damage greande

Right click - Shoot special grenade

Scroll wheel - Scroll between special grenades

------------------------

Installation:

Extract "Boom Hoppers.zip" anywhere you like and double click on the "Boom Hoppers" file.
